Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000. Considering its high quality and unique benefits, I believe it would be an excellent investment for you. To make this opportunity more attractive, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,800. This exclusive offer is available for a limited time only. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,800. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,800
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
